example.name: No arg1
example.text: Energy Transportation retained Litigation Sciences , at a cost of several hundred thousand dollars , whnp -1 *T*-1 to poll , pre-try , profile and shadow .

example.text: The concept gave him the idea of having lawyers pre-try cases before online juries.
